snippet: Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman said the decision to bench Alex Rodriguez and Nick Swisher for Game 3 wasn't a solo act on the part of Manager Joe Girardi, but a joint decision based on the players' regular and postseason play.
abstract: Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman said the decision to bench Alex Rodriguez and Nick Swisher for Game 3 wasn't a solo act on the part of Manager Joe Girardi, but a joint decision based on the players' regular and postseason play.

headline.main: Benching Rodriguez and Swisher Was a Group Decision
headline.print_headline: Benching Rodriguez and Swisher Is Group Decision
